Posts.Content: Vicky26 wrote: I'm 26 years old and about 2 months ago that i have a lump in my right breast.. on the left side of my nipple.. also about 2 weeks after feeling and seeing the lump it turn kinda of pink..but now, month and a half later it got darker. i went to the doctor about a month algo and again have an appointment later on today, Thursday I have a ultrasound appointment. The doctor told me the lump was 2an a half centimeters big. I've notice that when I have my period, it's not as visible as when I'm not in my periodAnd it doesn't feel the same.after reading about cancers that cause bruise/hickey like spot I'm really worried now... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast lump Vicky26 mustlovepoodles
